17.Chen Huanren (2006),296-299.Cui had supported Nie's wall poster af-
ter it first appeared. Zhou earned a Ph.D. in theoretical physics after studying at
the University of Chicago and the California Institute of Technology before
1949 andlaterbecomeBeida'spresident.
